titles.title: Robotics Competition Resolution of 2014
Establishing an academic competition in the field of robotics among students in Congressional districts.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 7/31/2014--Introduced. Robotics Competition Resolution of 2014 - Establishes an annual academic competition in the field of robotics to be held among students in each of the congressional districts.
